thread.title: South Korea’s Ex-President Accused of Taking $3 Million in Bribes From Spy Chiefs

author: wsjcom
title: South Korea’s Ex-President Accused of Taking $3 Million in Bribes From Spy Chiefs
text:
SEOUL—Prosecutors filed additional bribery charges against South Korea’s jailed former president Thursday, alleging she received official funds from her spy chiefs for personal purposes.
Park Geun-hye is accused of receiving a total of $3.3 million of official funds from three of her spy chiefs, an official at the Seoul Central District Prosecutors’ Office said.
